Shun Classic 2 Piece Asian Santoku Set

$500 Shun Purchase - $50 Gift Card offer
Free Chef's Resource $50 E-Gift Card with $500 or higher Shun knives purchase>> DETAILS
Note: Includes paring knife shown below in inset picture. The 2-knife picture shows the wrong paring knife.

The Shun Classic Asian Santoku set combines two of the most popular Shun knives in one promotionally-priced set. The set contains a Shun Paring/vegetable knife Knife which can be used for detail work on fruits and vegetables. Suitable for peeling, paring, trimming and more, the paring knife is a necessary knife to have on hand. The real star of the set is the 7 inch Hollow Ground Santoku knife. The santoku is designed to be used on meats, fish, and vegetables. Great for chopping, slicing, and more, the Santoku has a hollow ground edge which prevents cut items from sticking to the side of the blade. The set comes in beautiful packaging and makes a great gift.

Only cutlery of unparalleled appearance and uncompromising performance receives the mark of Shun. Shun Classic Series contain knives of traditional Japanese shape and craftsmanship in modern, innovative designs. Obtained by pounding 16 layers of high carbon stainless steel, the natural pattern of Damascus steel on the blade enhances the knives� beauty and utility, making cleaner, faster cuts that do not compromise the flavor of the food. Composed of VG-10 stainless steel core clad between SUS410 stainless steel, Shun Classic Series knives remain strong and sharp, requiring infrequent sharpening. Bolstered in stainless steel to each blade is a solid, ebony black Pakkawood handle in an ergonomic D-shape. The Pakkawood handles are comfortable to hold and beautiful to behold. The Shun Classic Series of cutlery is Shun's quintessential line that embodies the power of Shun in subtle simplicity. Each Classic blade, from the smallest to the largest, has the Shun logo emblazoned onto the blade's side.

Includes: 7 inch Hollow Ground Santoku and 3 1/2 inch Paring Knife.

Shun Classic knives are made in Japan. Limited Lifetime Manufacturer Warranty.

Questions & Answers about Shun Classic 2 Piece Asian Santoku Set

Does this set come with the bamboo box?
No it doesn't. The Shun santoku set is a nicely boxed 2-knife set at a special price.
How does this set come packaged?
It's package in a nice Shun box. Years ago it was in a bamboo box, but not any more.

Product Reviews

5  SO SHARP, January 11, 2013
Posted By: Claire

These knives truly live up to what was promised. So sharp and the best part is that they actually stay that way which is a lot of my problem with my old knives. I will recommend these to any one who asks and have already ordered another for my dad!

Was this rating helpful to you?   Yes No
5  I'll never buy another type of knife!, April 17, 2012
Posted By: Gary McInnis

I could not be more impressed with the quality and sharpness of this knife. I find myself using it daily for virtually anything I want to cut. From slicing limes to cutting ribs apart, everything is effortless!!

Was this rating helpful to you?   Yes No
